body:
Wall Street renowned brokerages following Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) have now given a mean price target of $132.103 on its stock. After accomplishing a methodical study, the analysts have specified a target price range.

The intense high range is put at $185 while the lowest price is $82. It is the mean price reached following the Zacks poll. In addition to this price estimate, the leading brokerages have announced the earnings estimates for Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL).

For the quarter, the forecasted EPS stands at $3.22 for Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL). The report is likely to be publicized on or around 2017-01-31. As per the latest update, the firm’s EPS came at $1.67 for the period ended 2016-09-30.

Zacks study examines the projections given by renowned brokerages in the industry. The hold, buy and sell recommendations are compiled to get an average rating on a 1-5 scale. It is a reducing scale, which can be conveniently decoded by shareholders. Brokers deploy unique mechanisms to get individual Buy/Sell references.

On the contrary, Zacks gets a consensus analyst rating on the stock. Value scores approaching towards 1 means a buy recommendation and rating of 5 is considered bearish for stock. Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL)’s rating score is 1.67 based on 29 stock views.

Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) probably will achieve EPS of $8.7 in next year. The experts have a positive EPS target of $9.48 for the company while the lowest estimate for the year is set at $8.16 year.

title: The Growth Forecast For Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) | The Markets Daily
